title: The development of transportation in and about New York
abstract: On the evening of March 3, 1930 at 8 o'clock Billings Wilson, Deputy Manager of the Port Authority in charge of Port Development in New York, will give a talk on the “Development of Transportation In and About New York.” The meeting will be held in the Engineering Auditorium, 33 West 39th Street, New York, N. Y. Following the meeting there will be an inspection of the Museum of the Peaceful Arts at 24 West 40th St. All members of the Institute are cordially invited to attend the meeting and inspection.
